name: Annie
title: the Dark Child
shortBio: Dangerous, yet disarmingly precocious, Annie is a child mage with immense pyromantic power. Even in the shadows of the mountains north of Noxus, she is a magical outlier. Her natural affinity for fire manifested early in life through unpredictable, emotional outbursts, though she eventually learned to control these “playful tricks.” Her favorite includes the summoning of her beloved teddy bear, Tibbers, as a fiery protector. Lost in the perpetual innocence of childhood, Annie wanders the dark forests, always looking for someone to play with.

skins.name: Goth Annie
skins.description: Her mother is dead. Her father is dead. But Annie remains, seeing beauty in the dark.

skins.name: Red Riding Annie
skins.description: Over the river and through the woods, to grandmother's house Annie went—not once suspecting that Warwick the Wolf was waiting for her. Of course, Warwick didn't know Annie could shoot balls of magic flame or summon a fiery bear, so really this was a larger issue with communication.

skins.name: Annie in Wonderland
skins.description: Down the rabbit hole Annie went, following the White Tibbers she had spied at the riverbank, until she emerged in a world much more curious than the one she had left. “Perhaps I shall stay,” she said to herself—and so she did.

skins.name: Frostfire Annie
skins.description: Annie is a Winterlands prodigy—a child born with both innate magic and a spirit guardian, the first of her kind in many generations. Though still young, she has already become a joyous fixture in the halls of the Poro King.

skins.name: FrankenTibbers Annie
skins.description: He's a towering abomination of science and magic. She's an eight year old with a beehive hairdo, and undiagnosed pyromania. Name a more iconic duo. I'll wait.

skins.name: Panda Annie
skins.description: Annie is a big part of Lunar Revel festivities, using her pyromancy to set off scores of high powered fireworks. Her panda bear Tibbers hauls the rockets for her, mauling anyone who tries to make off with even the smallest sparkler.

skins.name: Sweetheart Annie
skins.description: Sugar, spice, and everything nice: that's what Sweetheart Annie is made of! Tibbers is made of fire-resistant cotton blend and the insatiable hunger of a shadow bear, but he's still good for a hug or two. Probably just one, actually.

skins.name: Hextech Annie
skins.description: A scientific prodigy even among the intellectuals of the Hextech renaissance, Annie's beautiful, living warbears are among the most prized innovations of the era. Her most mysterious creation, Tibbers, is always close at hand—her confidant, friend, and monstrous bodyguard.

skins.name: Super Galaxy Annie
skins.description: The youngest human ever to be named a Super Galaxy cadet, Annie proved her mettle the day she turned her teddy bear into a self-piloting mech. Despite serious concerns over her highly combustible designs and volatile programming, Annie's Mecha-Tibbers went into full production. Desperate times call for destructive measures.

skins.name: Annie-Versary
skins.description: Ten years of epic outplays, last second turnarounds, and brutal throws - and we couldn't have done it without each and every one of you. Annie is ready to usher in the festivities, and Teemo… has been lifting, I see. Happy 10!

skins.name: Lunar Beast Annie

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the Lunar Beast 2021 event.

skins.description: Everyone was shocked when Annie was chosen as Ox Clan's tech operative. A precocious prodigy, Annie serves as the team's recon strategist, making sure the parade route is clear of civilians.

skins.name: Cafe Cuties Annie

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2021.

skins.description: Daughter of the cafe's owner and an accomplished pastry mage wunderkind, Annie has a sweet tooth to be reckoned with. Though her occasional hangry tantrums send her enchanted gummy bear scouring the cafe for any morsel of food fit for his master, with a full belly Annie is as sweet as sugar!

skins.name: Fright Night Annie

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2022.

skins.description:
Awful Orphan Annie comes home from school each day
A lonely little lady with whom no one will play
Now all her family's fled (or dead or gone away)
She can depend on Mr. Tibbers to make her new friends stay!

skins.name: Winterblessed Annie

descriptions.description: This chroma was released as a bundle exclusive in 2023.
This chroma was released as a Loot exclusive in the 2023 Winterblessed event.

skins.description: Senna set off to search for the Aurora, only to encounter the child, Annie, outside her estate. Her most cherished friend was her family's pet bear, who recently died. Annie wished for Polaris to bring him back to life, but Senna refused, and instead presented the bear in toy form. "Loss is a part of life, but his memories will live inside this gift.

passive.name: Pyromania
passive.description:
After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target.

Annie begins the game and respawns with Pyromania available.

spells.name: Disintegrate
spells.description: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
spells.dynamicDescription: Annie hurls a fireball, dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>. If the target dies, Annie refunds the Mana cost and reduces the Cooldown by 50%.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Incinerate
spells.description: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
spells.dynamicDescription: Annie projects a wave of fire, dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ magic damage</magicDamage>.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Molten Shield
spells.description: Grants Annie or an ally a shield, a burst of Move Speed, and damages enemies who strike her with attacks or spells.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Annie grants an ally champion @ShieldBlockTotal@ Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and @MoveSpeedCalc@ Decaying Move Speed for @MovementSpeedDuration@ seconds. While the shield holds, enemies who hit the shielded ally with an Attack or Ability receive @DamageReturn@ magic damage once per shield.

Tibbers always gains the effects of Molten Shield when summoned.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@

spells.name: Summon: Tibbers
spells.description: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
spells.dynamicDescription:
Annie summons her bear Tibbers, dealing @InitialBurstDamage@ magic damage. For the next @TibbersLifetime@ seconds, Tibbers burns nearby enemies for @TibbersAuraDamage@ magic damage per second.

Tibbers becomes enraged when summoned, if Annie stuns an enemy champion, and if Annie dies. When enraged, Tibbers gains 275% Attack Speed and 100% Move Speed decaying over 3 seconds.

Recast: Manually issue orders to Tibbers.@SpellModifierDescriptionAppend@
